long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BeneBox is a virtual charity box dedicated to a cause you care about. It rounds up change when you shop online and donates it to a charity chosen by you. 

SHOP
Shop online as normal and BeneBox will appear after you have paid and ask if you want to round up and save the change. 

SAVE 
Save the change and it will be added to your BeneBox, pledging it to your chosen charity. Or don't, it's totally up to you. 

DONATE
Donate the change whenever you want, and you'll be taken to the BeneBox website to make a secure card payment. 

100% of your donation is sent to your charity. You will pay a donation fee of 30p each time you donate, which is to pay for the card transaction fee. 

So what are you waiting for? Download today and inspire some kindness every time you shop online.
